body:
Hey guys Curently im working on a Minecraft {1.8} mod that a OCN mod {ShinyDialga} has coded im Curently working on a Version for Avicus Network

Like if you guys like this idea or got any Suggestions for it {Everything is Possible}

title: [Unofficial Avicus Mod]

replies.body:
This wouldn't work in Avicus, plus you should have probably asked the original author for the permissions. I don't even get how you would get the cores display to function, without dtc; furthermore, as some parts of the mod is based on XML parsing, and you just put it into a server which maps are YAML based.

Sorry but this thread doesn't make sense.
